channel.title: Java
channel.description:
Hi,
I want to compile my server and my client, I get a problem. It says that the java isn't reconized. I know that i need JDK for it. I have downloaded the latest java but that is normal java i need JDK. Can someone tell me where i can get JDK?? I use the offical site but there is no JDK 18 or JDK 6.0.
Thanks,
Sam.

item.title: Java
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

You need to change
“C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_21\bin\javac.exe”
to
javac

Other than that everything should work if you set up the environmental variables.

Read full topic

item.title: Java
item.dc:creator: @Samih1996 Samih1996
item.description:
@Samih1996 wrote:

Ok, I have a little problem with my server and clients " Run.bat "
This is my servers code for java

@echo off title rs2hd compiler echo Preparing... mkdir bin cd src copy log4j.xml .. cd .. move log4j.xml bin/ echo Compiling core... "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_21\bin\javac.exe" -d bin -cp deps/jython.jar;deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/mina-core-1.1.7.jar;deps/slf4j-api-1.5.3.jar;deps/slf4j-log4j12-1.5.3.jar;xpp3-1.1.4c.jar;deps/xstream-1.3.1-20081003.103259-2.jar;deps/xpp3-1.1.4c.jar -sourcepath src src/com/rs2hd/Main.java echo completed... echo running server... title Server. java -Xmx1024m -classpath bin;deps/jython.jar;deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/mina-core-1.1.7.jar;deps/slf4j-api-1.5.3.jar;deps/slf4j-log4j12-1.5.3.jar;xpp3-1.1.4c.jar;deps/xstream-1.3.1-20081003.103259-2.jar;deps/xpp3-1.1.4c.jar com.rs2hd.Main pause

And this is for my Client:

@echo off java -cp bin;lib/clientlibs.jar client 0 live english game0 pause

What type of java do i need for these?

Read full topic

item.title: Java
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

The path should be going to jdk, yes.
Path:

C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_21\bin;

Classpath:

CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_21\bin;%CLASSPATH%;

Read full topic

item.title: Java
item.dc:creator: @Samih1996 Samih1996
item.description:
@Samih1996 wrote:

So will this make a path going like: C:Program Files\Java\jdk… ?
Because i have the latest java and the path is : C: Program Files\Java\jre6\

Read full topic
